description: Schema for spacebox server request validation
title: Spacebox request API

___user_id.description: user ID, information on the status of which you want to receive
___user_id.title: user_id

_88messages.markAsRead.description: To mark a message as read
_88messages.markAsRead.title: messages.markAsRead

___start_message_id.description: When transferring this parameter will be marked as read all messages since this
___start_message_id.title: start_message_id

___sig.description: md5 from the concatenation of the expire, mid, secret, sid
___sig.title: Signature

_88messages.getDialogs.description: Returns a list of the currents user dialogs
_88messages.getDialogs.title: messages.getDialogs

_88messages.getHistory.description: Returns the message history for the specified user
_88messages.getHistory.title: messages.getHistory

___user_id.description: User ID, history of correspondence which should be returned
___user_id.title: user_id

___count.description: The number of messages to retrieve
___count.title: count

___start_message_id.description: Message ID from which you want to return the history of correspondence
___start_message_id.title: start_message_id

___offset.description: Offset required for sampling a subset of messages
___offset.title: offset

_88friends.get.description: returns a list of ID of the user's friends
_88friends.get.title: friends.get

_88friends.delete.description: remove user from your friends list
_88friends.delete.title: friends.delete

___user_id.description: ID of the user you want to remove from your friends list
___user_id.title: user_id

_88messages.get.description: Returns a list of incoming or outgoing personal messages of the current user
_88messages.get.title: messages.get

___count.description: The number of messages to retrieve
___count.title: count

___last_message_id.description: ID of a message received before that you need to return the last
___last_message_id.title: last_message_id

___out.description: If this parameter is 1, the server returns the outgoing messages
___out.title: out

___offset.description: Offset required for sampling a subset of messages
___offset.title: offset

_88status.set.description: sets a new status to the current user
_88status.set.title: status.set

___text.description: the text of the new status
___text.title: text

___sig.description: md5 from the concatenation of the expire, mid, secret, sid
___sig.title: Signature
